summary:
This is a character who\\\'s a Wood-Elf. This Character has incredible perks... I unlocked every perk of the \\\"Warrior\\\" class;
Smithing,Heavy Armor,One-Handed,Two-Handed,Archery,Light Armor,Block and Sneak...
descriptionHtml:
This is a saved game of a Wood-Elf...An ULTIMATE Wood-Elf!!!
I suggest you change the name of the character. This is how it\\\'s done if you don\\\'t know;
1.open the console command by hitting tilde(`)button.
2.Then type: showracemenu
3.!DO NOT CHANGE THE RACE OR YOU\\\'LL LOSE ALL THE PERKS!
4. Then add a warpaint if u like(it will be removed when you open the race menu), Change Hair if you want...
5. Then click \\\"done\\\" and type your new name...

Description;
(Character)
This is a character who\\\'s a Wood-Elf. This Character has incredible perks... I unlocked every perk of the \\\"Warrior\\\" class;
Smithing,Heavy Armor,One-Handed,Two-Handed,Archery,Light Armor,Block and Sneak...

(Inventory)
I put the Daedric Armor/Weapons and the Ebony Armor/Weapons...(I also added the \\\'Ebony Blade\\\' as extra)
I put 5000 potions of health,magicka and stamina each. I also put 1000 potion of cure disease.
And the best, I put 1010000 GOLD!!!

(Missions)
The Missions of escaping from helgen(Unbound), Bleak falls Barrow, killing the dragon at wester watch tower. 
Oh, and i helped Faendal, so you can have him as a follower...

I am also thane of Whiterun, i bought Breezhome(House in Whiterun)... But for some reasone, when i get in the house, my game closes!!! I hope it works on yours :p
author: ThEArcheR1907
